mapper.select: select count(*) from crew where crew_name = #{input_name}
mapper.insert: insert into crew(large, small, crew_num, crew_name, crew_contents, crew_limit, crew_now, crew_member, crew_manager) values(#{large}, #{small}, crew_seq.nextval, #{crewname}, #{crewcontents}, #{crewlimit}, 1, #{crewmember}, #{crewmanager})
mapper.select: select crew_now, crew_limit from crew where crew_name = #{crewname}
select count(*) from crew where crew_limit>crew_now and small = 'M'
select count(*) from crew where crew_limit>crew_now and small = 'P'
select count(*) from crew where crew_limit = crew_now
select * from crew where crew_member like #{loginId}
